title: Interpretation of sleep in the bathroom

preview.html: There is no doubt that the interpretation of this dream has more than one meaning and this will be clarified through our translator, as we will show you sleeping in the toilet, the interpretation of dreams of a child sleeping in the bathroom, the interpretation of dreams about the bathtub, so follow us. Interpretation of a dream about sleeping in the bathroom for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees that she is sleeping in the bathroom, it is good that she will get married soon. It also promises that he will live a life full of happiness. This vision also indicates the things that this girl is ashamed to do in front of people, knowing that she could To be normal and sometimes unnatural. Seeing her entering and relieving herself indicates that this girl will be freed from all the sins she commits and her repentance to God. Her entering and leaving without having to relieve herself means that there are fundamental changes in this girl’s life. Seeing an unmarried woman cleaning the bathroom means that she She will leave her fiancé due to his bad behavior, and God knows best. Seeing the toilet for an unmarried woman expresses her relationship with the unfaithful person who wants to insult her and tarnish her reputation, so she must stay away from him. See also: Interpretation of seeing a shower in a dream according to major commentators. Interpretation of seeing sleeping in the bathroom in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman In the bathroom in a dream means that this woman must continue to seek forgiveness and refrain from sins. The vision may express the collapse of the problems that this woman is going through. While she sees the bathroom without sleep, it appears that she doubts her husband, but he is innocent and wronged by what she attributes to him. And when he sees that he enters The bathroom and relieves himself in it, this is good news that he will soon recover from an illness that he suffers from. Sometimes this vision expresses the marital problems that this woman is suffering from. He must ask for forgiveness to overcome this ordeal and ask for God’s help. While watching her sleeping in the bathroom after being exposed to this problem This means that he is unable to confront these problems and solve them. If a woman sees herself entering the bathroom with her husband, this represents the extent of love between her and her husband, as well as the upcoming pregnancy. A married woman’s vision of a clean bathroom expresses her good morals and high qualities. Interpretation of seeing sleep in the bathroom In a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees that she is sleeping in the bathroom, then this expresses the difficulties that this woman is going through, so she asks for forgiveness. Whereas if he sees himself entering the bathroom to relieve himself, then it is good news that he will be freed from all the sins that he commits. When she emits a pleasant smell when she enters the bathroom This is a sign of happy news that this woman will hear soon, and God knows best. Seeing the bathroom clean means that there will be positive changes for this woman that will bring her happiness and it is also evidence of the end of all her problems. The dream can express her marriage again if she sees herself entering the bathroom With a man you do not know. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about entering the bathroom with someone I know. Interpretation of a dream about sleeping in the bathroom for a man and its meaning. If a man sees himself sleeping in the bathroom, this expresses the beliefs and thoughts within that person, but he cannot reveal them or get rid of them. This vision expresses

title: The 16 most accurate interpretation by Ibn Sirin of seeing a crow dreamed in a dream

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of the crow in a dream and its meaning: The crow is considered one of the most famous birds in the world in relation to the story of the killing of Abel’s brother at the hands of Cain. The crow has a distinctive sound and shape. As for seeing it in a dream, it is considered one of the frightening visions because many people are pessimistic about it in reality. With an Egyptian website, seeing it in a dream is interpreted with reference to the most important interpretations of major commentators. The crow in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about a crow means that the dreamer’s wife will become pregnant and give birth to a boy, but this vision shows that This child was not one of the obedient children to his parents. Rather, he will be corrupt and disobedient, and there is nothing wrong with him. He is not known for his parental honor and his great value in religion, and this interpretation will occur if the dreamer sees that a crow in a dream interacts with him as a human being. Seeing a crow in a dream standing on a tree branch means that there is an evil friend that the dreamer has known for some time, as he claims to love the dreamer, but in reality He hates him and hates him, and therefore this person will not deserve the word friend, and this vision has another indication that there is someone lurking to steal the dreamer’s money or possessions, such as a car or a house. Since the reason for the raven’s descent is to learn how to bury the dead so that Cain can bury his brother Abel and separate Brothers forever. Seeing a crow in a dream is one of its most important connotations of separation. Interpreters indicated that this separation will be either with the dreamer’s journey and leaving him with his loved ones or the journey of a relative for many years. Perhaps this separation will be between married or unmarried people. If the dreamer eats meat The crow in his dream, this vision is not good and indicates that the dreamer will earn his money from thieves and swindlers, and if the fortuneteller in a dream turns into a crow bird, this means that he does not fear God in his work and earns his money from forbidden things. If the crow scratches the dreamer in his dream and causes a wound in one parts of his body, then this vision indicates a disease that causes the dreamer’s death. If the dreamer dreams that a crow catches prey and brings it to him, then the dream interpretation means the absurd spoils that the dreamer will gain. If the dreamer catches a crow in his dream while it is alive, then the dream interpretation means That he will be able to catch the thief who stole him. A man dreams in a dream that he is inside a farm or field and finds a crow in it. This vision means that this person carries good and evil within him, and this dream indicates that his children will come from a forbidden path. And illicit relationships. Seeing a crow eating a dreamer’s body indicates battles that will occur between the dreamer and his brothers in the very near future. If the imprisoned dreamer sees the crow in the dream, this vision symbolizes his own jailer, and many interpreters have said that if the dreamer performs the Istikhara prayer and immortalizes To sleep after that and see the crow in the dream, it means that the dreamer asked the subject, by God, of the bad deeds that he would regret if he carried them out. If the crow stood over the Kaaba in the priest’s dream, it means a marriage relationship between a corrupt and immoral person and a woman known for her honor and morals. Google Dream Interpretation Site Egyptian and

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing a smell in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website offers you the complete interpretation of smell in a dream, from the books of leading scholars, the interpretation of dreams and visions, as well as the interpretation of smell in a dream presented to us, my dear. We see in a dream that the whole person smells a bad odor, and also what is the interpretation of dreaming of a bad smell in the house and what is the interpretation of seeing a bad smell left in a dream full of vulva, if you are interested in knowing the interpretation of this dream, just follow the article.Why dream of a person smelling the interpretation that One smells the full scent of a person’s perfume in a dream, and if this is unpleasant, it indicates rude and disrespectful words coming from the person. Also, seeing a person in a dream smelling an unpleasant odor indicates a warning and a warning to the dreamer about his repentance and closeness to God Almighty. Smelling the scent of human perfume And in the dream, Kamal was beautiful and handsome, meaning goodness, purity, purity of soul, and good morals. Its smell is like a dream filled with seeing the smell in the dream changing according to its smell. If the smell of mint comes out completely in the dream, this is a sign of the dreamer recovering from his illness. It also indicates the smell of a wonderful aromatic scent, a nozzle. Coming out of the air in a dream, this is a good omen and great support that the dreamer will receive. A pleasant smell in a dream signifies good morals, closeness to religion, as well as the seriousness and strength of the dreamer in the face of evil and enemies. Smelling a good smell in a dream Why dream of a fragrant scent of perfume means great knowledge and good morals And closeness to the Creator. In addition, the dark smell in the dream is money and a sign that the dreamer will escape from trouble and will need to release the captive. Dreaming of a smelly person. The interpretation of seeing a disgusting person in a complete dream indicates the emergence of a large arc between them and their inability to resolve their conflict. The wind blowing from the dreamer in a dream completely shows that he has abandoned religion and committed many prohibitions and mistakes. Also, the unpleasant smell from a person in a complete dream indicates that the dreamer has received many unpleasant things from this person. Why dream of the smell of sweatInterpretation of seeing the smell of sweat A foul smell in a dream indicates immorality, sins, and the commission of many forbidden acts, as well as the dreamer’s mistakes. Why dream of a foul smell in the house? The foul smell emanating from a house in a dream fully indicates that the owners of this house are carrying out unwanted and forbidden actions, as well as their corruption in religion and in this world. Why do you dream of a bad smell coming from the Gulf? It indicates that bad words will come out and the dreamer will enter a period full of unpleasant things and enter a state of sadness. Because I dream of a man who smells my perfume, the dreamer’s scent as a human being, and he was completely beautiful in the dream, and this is good news about kindness, love and affection between him and This person.Unlike a bad smell, it gives birth to a dreamer who completely overcomes many problems and obstacles between him and the person in the dream.If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comments below and our team will answer you.

title: What if I dream that my wife is pregnant?  What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation?

preview.html: I dreamed that my wife was pregnant. Does seeing your wife’s pregnancy portend good or bad? What are the negative interpretations of a wife's pregnancy? What does a wife’s pregnancy mean for a girl in a dream? In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing my wife pregnant according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and the leading scholars of interpretation. I dreamed that my wife was pregnant. The interpretation of the dream that my wife is pregnant indicates that God Almighty will provide the dreamer with abundant goodness, both him and his wife soon, and if the dreamer’s partner is sick and he sees her pregnant in In a dream, this indicates that. She will soon recover from her illness and enjoy health and well-being, but if the dreamer’s wife is barren, then seeing her pregnant means that she will face some financial problems in the coming period. Interpreters said that seeing the dreamer himself pregnant with him and his wife is a sign of the difficult stage they are going through in their relationship. And the instability they suffer from. Strong enough to overcome it. Scientists have interpreted that if the dreamer sees his partner pregnant and feels happy, this indicates that she loves him very much and spends her most beautiful days with him. Some interpreters believe that a married man who sees his partner pregnant in a dream will enjoy stability with her soon and the problems between her and his family will end. I dreamed that my wife was pregnant with Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted that seeing a pregnant woman in a dream brings a lot of goodness to the pioneer and portends his good condition and a change in the circumstances of his life for the better. Ibn Sirin said that if a married man sees his partner pregnant and he does not already have children, this indicates that he wants To have children and think a lot about this, which will be reflected in his dreams. It is close to the point where it does not count. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a pregnant woman is evidence of good children that the dreamer will hear about soon. The Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet is a site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just write. The Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet. Search for it on Google and get On the correct interpretations. The most important interpretations of a dream about a pregnant wife: I dreamed that my wife was pregnant with a boy. The interpreters said: Seeing a wife pregnant with a boy is a sign of imminent death, and that the Lord (Glory be to Him) is the Knower of eternity. He is healthy and follows doctor's orders until he gets over it. However, if the dreamer is waiting for the news of his wife’s pregnancy in reality, he has the news that she will become pregnant. I dreamed that my wife is pregnant with a girl. Scientists interpreted that if the dreamer sees his wife pregnant with a girl, this symbolizes the good news that he will hear about his family soon. She is pregnant with a girl and she is in complete bliss. This symbolizes that they will soon reach compromise solutions to the differences that exist between them. I dreamed that my wife is pregnant with twins. Seeing the wife pregnant with twins indicates many positive things that will happen soon to the dreamer and his partner and the good relationship that unites them. Dreaming that she is in pain and suffering from pregnancy in her dream means that her condition The psychological state is bad and you feel lonely and emotionally empty. I dreamed that my wife was pregnant with a boy while she was pregnant. The commentators said that if she

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing my daughter’s ex-fiancé in a dream

Also, seeing the daughter’s ex-fiancé may mean the approaching of the daughter’s wedding, and God knows all that no one has seen. title: Interpretation of a snake in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we present to you the interpretation of a snake in a dream. The dream world sometimes carries a message or good news for the pioneer about something good that will happen to him and can warn him that something bad will happen to him. Him, but this does not necessarily mean that all our dreams carry hidden messages that must be interpreted so that we can predict what they are. In many cases, dreams are simply an outlet from the subconscious as a result of the many psychological and nervous stresses that the dreamer is experiencing. On the Encyclopedia website, we discuss below the dream interpretation of seeing snakes in a dream in their various forms, so follow us.Interpretation of a snake in a dreamThe snake in a dream means the enemy, and the interpretation varies depending on its color. If someone sees a white snake, this means the difficulty and strength of his enemy, but whoever sees it black shows danger. His enemy. Whoever sees many snakes in his garden or orchard, this means that his plant will flourish and grow well. Whoever sees in his dream a snake emerging from a place on the ground, this indicates the appearance of witnesses in that place. Whoever sees in his dream that many snakes are coiling around him, This means that his enemy is from his family, but they will not harm him as long as none of the snakes bite him in the dream. Seeing a snake in a dream and catching it without fear means that the dreamer is safe from what worries him, according to the Almighty’s words: He said: Take it and do not be afraid, We will return it to its original form. And whoever sees a snake entering his mouth, this means an increase in his knowledge and understanding, but if it comes out of it, it means that he is speaking to him with words that will greatly harm him. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin: Seeing a snake in a dream means an enemy, and it may refer to the wife or children, as God Almighty says: If one of your wives and children is your enemy. So beware of them. If the dreamer eats snake meat, this indicates that he will obtain the enemy’s money. As for whoever sees in his dream a snake speaking to him kindly and kindly, this will bring him goodness, God willing. And whoever sees in his dream a vision of a living dead person, this means That God has protected him from the evil of the enemy that lurks around him. Whoever sees himself becoming a beard in his dream means that his condition has turned into an enemy of Islam. If the dreamer sees in his dream many snakes in his house, but he is not afraid of them, this means that he hosts in his house the enemies of Islam and Muslims. Interpretation of Nabul: Whoever is married and sees in his dream a snake eating his son, this means that his wife is committing adultery. As for whoever sees in his dream that he has a snake, this means that he will assume an important position. He also interprets seeing a snake in a dream as a spiteful or envious neighbor, or a wife and children who are harboring Hostility and hatred towards the dreamer. Seeing a snake in a dream and killing it. Whoever sees in his dream that he is fighting a snake, this indicates his victory over an enemy, and if he is bitten, this indicates that he has been harmed by his enemy in proportion to the amount of harm he caused him. Also, the snake in the dream indicates a woman, who is He saw himself killing a snake in his bed, this means the death of his wife. Whoever fights the snake in his dream and divides it into two parts means that he will be humiliated by the enemy that is chasing him. We advise you not to follow your dreams, and let their interpretation, whether good or bad, control your life and be the first factor that motivates you And finally suck

We advise you not to follow your dreams, and let their interpretation, good or bad, control your life and be the first factor that motivates you, and in the end, your fate

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a shark in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a shark in a dream, the good and evil of seeing a shark in a dream for single, married and pregnant women, and the interpretation of a dream about eating a shark and attacking the dreamer. Being any animal or human, there is no need to be confused in attacking it directly, so that anyone would feel terrified and terrified once they heard the name shark, so does the owner who sees the shark like this feel as soon as he sees it in a dream? What we will know today through our article on the Al-Takaya website: Interpretation of seeing a shark in a dream for a single woman, interpretation of a shark in a dream for a married woman, and interpretation of a dream about a shark in a dream for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a shark by Ibn Sirini: A shark in a dream generally has many interpretations, and if There were many and their number was large, so here women appear. Seeing a shark in a dream also means gaining money, wealth, power and authority. Also, again and again, it can symbolize cunning, cunning, conspiracies, injuries, dangers and accidents. Ibn Sirin has some interpretations of dreaming of a shark in a dream He says that the interpretation of a dream about a shark attacking and chasing it in a dream means that there is an enemy and evil people waiting for that. He also mentioned that the interpretation of seeing a shark in a house indicates the good and benefit that the owners of that house suffer from. The interpretation of a dream about a shark and the sea is clear, and Ibn Sirin interpreted it as bliss. And abundance of food and well-being. Seeing a dead shark in a dream means that the dreamer is lucky and a lot of money will come to him. If someone sees that he is trying to catch a shark in a dream, this symbolizes that he has not achieved his goal at all. Seeing a person catching a shark means That he will take something in the hands of others, and this is forbidden for him; Because he dreams of illusions that will not come true. Interpretation of a dream about a shark for a single womanInterpretation of a dream about a shark for a girl The dream about a single girl symbolizes that there is a groom proposing to her, and he is a bad person and his morals are not good. Seeing escaping from a shark in a single girl’s dream means that another person is harming her At work, study, or something similar. If an unmarried girl sees that she catches a shark and then eats it in a dream, this indicates an amount of money that will come to her, a job that she will find or succeed in her studies. Interpretation of a dream about a shark for a married woman: Seeing a shark in a dream for a married woman It means that she will fall into a big problem and a difficult crisis with her wife or her husband’s family. The interpretation of a dream that a shark bites a married woman or hurts her in a dream indicates that there is a treacherous person. The interpretation of seeing a shark in a dream for a married woman as if it were chasing her indicates that she will Happy and satisfied in her married life. Interpretation of a shark in a dream chasing a married woman in a dream indicates that she is susceptible to envy and the presence of many hypocrites in her life. Interpretation of a dream about a shark for a pregnant woman: Seeing a shark in a dream for a pregnant woman is a bad interpretation, because it symbolizes the death of her fetus. When Seeing a shark chasing a pregnant woman, hitting her and hurting her, this indicates that her young son will be harmed and his arms will likely be cut off or hurt.

title: Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child by Ibn Sirin and its consequences

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of breastfeeding a child in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its consequences. Breastfeeding in a dream for a pregnant or married woman has many connotations, especially since some of these meanings bring kindness to the dreamer or carry various other meanings. There are many interpretation scholars interested in clarifying the meanings of this vision and its implications throughout the article. We learn about the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of breastfeeding a child in a dream and its consequences.Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of breastfeeding a child in a dream and its consequencesBreastfeeding in a dream is one of the dreams that is not strange to a woman, especially if she is married, but this vision makes many of them feel curious about its meanings and implications. This vision. The interpretation of the dream of breastfeeding a child in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its consequences is also: Seeing breastfeeding and breastfeeding in a dream, as interpreted by the scholar Ibn Sirin, restricts the freedom of the dreamer. Also, breastfeeding in a dream for a married or unmarried woman is a sign of hardship and distress. It is worth noting that It is not good to see breastfeeding in a dream except for a pregnant woman. Since this dream is a sign of health for her, then protect her from the dangers of pregnancy and childbirth. Breastfeeding in a dream, according to what Al-Nabulsi said, is a sign of a change in mood. It also expresses worries and sorrows, and God The highest and most knowledgeable. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a slaughtered chicken by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. Interpretation of the vision of breastfeeding an only child. It is considered one of the strange visions for many girls. It carries many different interpretations and varies according to the details in the dream. Here we learn about the interpretation of the vision of breastfeeding an only child. It is also: If an unmarried girl is seen. A married woman delays her marriage while she is breastfeeding the child. This is evidence of the sadness and psychological problems she is experiencing at that time. Meanwhile, the girl sees that she is breastfeeding the child who has no milk in her breast and feels sad for him. This means that this girl is going through an internal psychological crisis that pushes her to isolate herself from people. She needs To get out of this crisis quickly. See also: Interpretation of a dream about honey in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its effects. Interpretation of a vision of a married woman breastfeeding a child who is not my child. There are many interpretive scholars who have contributed to clarifying the meanings and implications of the dreams that we see in a dream, and perhaps among them is breastfeeding a child in a dream who is not a child. The dreamer, this dream included a lot. Interpretations are often positive, and here we review them for you. The interpretation of a vision of a married woman breastfeeding a child other than her own is also: If a married woman sees that she is breastfeeding a child other than her own and she has children. This dream indicates that the dreamer is a gentle, kind-hearted woman who constantly sympathizes with those around her. Also, This vision will be a good omen for the dreamer of good offspring and pregnancy, and that she will give birth soon, and God Almighty knows. Likewise, if a married woman dreams that she is breastfeeding a woman. This dream is a sign of food, and the coming good news for the dreamer, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. But if she sees that she is breastfeeding a man in A dream for a married woman. It is a sign of sadness and great misery in which the dreamer lives, and God is Most High and knows this. See also: Interpretation

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a naked sister in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a naked sister in a dream: The entire interpretation of the dream was obtained through the most famous dream interpreters, such as Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen, and most of them agreed that being naked in a dream is evidence of the revelation of a secret. Marital status. Interpretation of seeing a naked sister in a dream. Seeing a naked sister in front of people means that she will get what she wants soon. Seeing a naked sister in a dream means that the doors of nourishment and kindness will open before her soon. The girl’s nakedness in the dream indicates that she will get closer to her marriage to a moral and pious young man. She will have a high status in his social environment, and whoever dreams that his sister is naked in front of strangers, this is a sign that he will be like that. They will be exposed to troubles and disasters in the coming period, and one of the interpretations mentioned by Ibn Shaheen is that there is a secret that this girl is hiding from everyone around her that will be revealed soon. Interpretation of seeing a naked sister in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing a naked sister in a dream is evidence that she will enjoy health and prosperity in her life And she will live happy days. And God knows that seeing a naked, unmarried sister indicates the approaching engagement. Seeing a dead person naked with a frown on his face indicates that the person who had the vision is one of the people close to God Almighty, and, God willing, he will gain Paradise later. If a married man sees a dead person naked, this indicates that he will be exposed to misfortune. The near future of a financial crisis that is difficult to deal with. Interpretation of seeing a naked sister in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees herself naked in front of people, this is a sign that she will enjoy what she desires in the world and all doors of goodness will open before her. If an unmarried woman sees her unmarried sister stripping From her clothes in front of a group of strangers, this foretells that she will be exposed to a big problem because of which she will be depressed for a long time. Interpretation of seeing a naked sister in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a naked sister in a dream indicates that God Almighty will grant her healthy offspring and she will give birth soon, but if a married woman sees a woman who does not She knows how to get naked in front of people, this is proof of that. Indicating the kindness and nourishment that will dominate her life, and God knows best, Ibn Shaheen explained seeing an unmarried sister naked in a married woman’s dream, and this symbolizes that the woman who sees the vision will be exposed to a large number of problems and judgments. Especially between her and her husband and his family, and the situation may eventually lead to divorce. Interpretation of seeing a naked sister in a dream for a pregnant woman. Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing a naked sister in a dream is a sign of the approaching time of childbirth, and if she sees her sister taking off her clothes in front of her, this means that childbirth will be easy by order. God. Interpretation of seeing a naked sister in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a naked sister in a separate dream is a sign that many secrets will be revealed in the coming period before the dreamer and many things will become clear to her, and this will disturb her life because she will turn the page and forget all the pain she went through. Interpretation of seeing a naked sister in a dream For a man: Seeing a naked sister in a man’s dream is a sign of financial loss

Interpretation of seeing a naked sister in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing a naked sister in a dream is evidence that she will enjoy health and prosperity in her life And she will live happy days. And God knows that seeing a naked, unmarried sister indicates the approaching engagement. Seeing a dead person naked with a frown on his face indicates that the person who had the vision is one of the people close to God Almighty, and, God willing, he will gain Paradise later. If a married man sees a dead person naked, this indicates that he will be exposed to misfortune. The near future of a financial crisis that is difficult to deal with. Interpretation of seeing a naked sister in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees herself naked in front of people, this is a sign that she will enjoy what she desires in the world and all doors of goodness will open before her. If an unmarried woman sees her unmarried sister stripping From her clothes in front of a group of strangers, this foretells that she will be exposed to a big problem because of which she will be depressed for a long time. Interpretation of seeing a naked sister in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a naked sister in a dream indicates that God Almighty will grant her healthy offspring and she will give birth soon, but if a married woman sees a woman who does not She knows how to get naked in front of people, this is proof of that. Indicating the kindness and nourishment that will dominate her life, and God knows best, Ibn Shaheen explained seeing an unmarried sister naked in a married woman’s dream, and this symbolizes that the woman who sees the vision will be exposed to a large number of problems and judgments. Especially between her and her husband and his family, and the situation may eventually lead to divorce. Interpretation of seeing a naked sister in a dream for a pregnant woman. Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing a naked sister in a dream is a sign of the approaching time of childbirth, and if she sees her sister taking off her clothes in front of her, this means that childbirth will be easy by order. God. Interpretation of seeing a naked sister in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a naked sister in a separate dream is a sign that many secrets will be revealed in the coming period before the dreamer and many things will become clear to her, and this will disturb her life because she will turn the page and forget all the pain she went through. Interpretation of seeing a naked sister in a dream For a man: Seeing a naked sister in a man’s dream is a sign of financial loss
